narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Arc of Greater Plymouth is a Foster Care Agency provider based in Plymouth, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.0M in Medicaid payments across 179K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
